title: Granny's Christmas cake
ingredients: ['170g (6 oz) glace cherries', '225g (8 oz) currants', '225g (8 oz) raisins', '225g (8 oz) sultanas', '50g (2 oz) mixed peel', '1 orange', '150ml (5 fl oz) brandy', '200g (7 oz) butter', '225g (8 oz) brown sugar', '4 eggs', '225g (8 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground mixed spice', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '50g (2 oz) chopped nuts', '4 tablespoons apricot jam', 'block of marzipan, rolled to 0.5cm thick', 'ready-roll icing, rolled to 0.5cm thick']
